title: Create Human-Readable Time Formatting
description: In this lab, we will explore a function called formatDuration that helps us convert a given number of milliseconds into a human-readable format. We will learn how to use mathematical operations to extract the appropriate values for days, hours, minutes, seconds, and milliseconds. We will also use various array methods like filter, map, and join to create a string that displays the duration in a user-friendly way. By the end of this lab, you will have a deeper understanding of how to manipulate and format time-related data in JavaScript.

verify.name: Verify Node Command Usage
